{{$data.$item.messagecontent}}

data.code:
document.querySelector('#chat_base').classList.add('sending')

var messageData = {}
var selectedConversation = cti.store.variables.selectedConversation
messageData.method = selectedConversation.method
messageData.service = selectedConversation.service
messageData.conversationid = selectedConversation.conversationid
messageData.sender = 'PRACTITIONER'
messageData.senderuuid = cti.store.variables.userUUID
messageData.messagecontent = cti.store.pages.conversation.txtChatMessage
messageData.serviceuserid = selectedConversation.serviceuserid
//work out the sent to on the server
cti.store.variables.messagePayload = messageData;
$success()
